subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Penn State trustees promised to move forward with a detailed evaluation of changes recommended by the former F.B.I. director Louis Freeh in response to the sexual abuse scandal.
snippet: Penn State trustees promised to move forward with a detailed evaluation of changes recommended by the former F.B.I. director Louis Freeh in response to the sexual abuse scandal.
